name: Embustero
description:
Your goal is get to the end.


Notes:
Tested on MacOS, so it's possible that the best experience is there.
If you choose play it on the web... Well....
1- Play it on full screen. For some reason, the resolution is just bad, sorry :'c
2- If you die, please reload the game HAHAHAHHAHA, so sorry.

This is a not finished game, not as I wanted, I had some many plans for this, but this is my first game and my first game jam, I have learnt a lot on those days. Yeah, I know, there is no music. I actually did it, but it just sucked, so, better having a nice silence instead of annoying weird sounds, right? :'(
